subcategory.name: Product Quickviews
subcategory.description: Ecommerce product quick preview examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS product quickview components to let customers preview product details in a modal window without leaving the current page. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
